00022 #ifndef H__dfsch__eqhash__
00023 #define H__dfsch__eqhash__
00024 
00025 #include <dfsch/dfsch.h>
00026 
00027 #define DFSCH_EQHASH_SMALL_SIZE 4
00028 #define DFSCH_EQHASH_CACHE_SIZE 8
00029 
00030 #define DFSCH_EQHASH_LARGE 1
00031 
00032 typedef struct dfsch_eqhash_entry_t dfsch_eqhash_entry_t;
00033 
00034 struct dfsch_eqhash_entry_t {
00035   dfsch_object_t* key;
00036   dfsch_eqhash_entry_t* next;
00037   dfsch_object_t* value;
00038   short flags;
00039 };
00040 
00041 typedef struct dfsch__eqhash_small_t {
00042   dfsch_object_t* keys[DFSCH_EQHASH_SMALL_SIZE];
00043   dfsch_object_t* values[DFSCH_EQHASH_SMALL_SIZE];
00044   short flags[DFSCH_EQHASH_SMALL_SIZE];
00045 } dfsch__eqhash_small_t;
00046 
00047 typedef struct dfsch__eqhash_large_t {
00048   dfsch_eqhash_entry_t* cache[DFSCH_EQHASH_CACHE_SIZE];
00049   dfsch_eqhash_entry_t** vector;
00050   size_t mask;
00051   size_t count;
00052 } dfsch__eqhash_large_t;
00053 
00054 typedef struct dfsch_eqhash_t {
00055   int is_large; 
00056   /*this can be changed to char or bitfield or whatever when necessary*/
00057   union {
00058     dfsch__eqhash_small_t small;
00059     dfsch__eqhash_large_t large;
00060   } contents;
00061 } dfsch_eqhash_t; 
00062 
00063 void dfsch_eqhash_init(dfsch_eqhash_t* hash, int start_large);
00064 void dfsch_eqhash_put(dfsch_eqhash_t* hash,
00065                       dfsch_object_t* key, dfsch_object_t* value);
00066 void dfsch_eqhash_set(dfsch_eqhash_t* hash,
00067                       dfsch_object_t* key, dfsch_object_t* value);
00068 int dfsch_eqhash_unset(dfsch_eqhash_t* hash, dfsch_object_t* key);
00069 void dfsch_eqhash_set_flags(dfsch_eqhash_t* hash,
00070                             dfsch_object_t* key, long flags);
00071 int dfsch_eqhash_set_if_exists(dfsch_eqhash_t* hash,
00072                                dfsch_object_t* key, dfsch_object_t* value,
00073                                short* flags);
00074 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_eqhash_ref(dfsch_eqhash_t* hash,
00075                                  dfsch_object_t* key);
00076 int dfsch_eqhash_ref_ex(dfsch_eqhash_t* hash,
00077                         dfsch_object_t* key, 
00078                         dfsch_object_t** value, short *flags, 
00079                         dfsch_eqhash_entry_t** entry);
00080 
00081 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_eqhash_2_alist(dfsch_eqhash_t* hash);
00082 #endif
